servinfo.title: Fuel System Description

attention2.ptxt: This engine requires the unleaded fuel only.
The leaded and/or low lead fuel can result in engine damage and reduce the effectiveness of the emission control system.

servinfo.ptxt: The main components of the fuel system are fuel tank, fuel pump assembly (with fuel filter and fuel level gauge), fuel pressure regulator, fuel feed line and fuel vapor line.
For the details of fuel flow, refer to Fuel Delivery System Diagram:For Petrol Engine Model .
